pages.text: $(o)Waiting for Phantoms to appear naturally is a pain. Let me offer an alternative. There is a Power unlike the others, a $(l:intro/curse)dark Power$(/l). While Mind is being consumed by it, any death near the Crucible will bring a Phantom about.

$(o)Their flesh makes for a good renewable source of Mind, and the byproduct is quite sticky. I wonder if it could be $(4)transmuted into something useful$(0)? $(br2)If so, the best bet would be to experiment with $(4)dissolved plants$(0).
